page.title: 17The Day of a Primary Pupil
page.content: I am woken by my alarm at about{7-15 but do not immediately get up. When I do arise at about{7-30}I often listen to the radio or read a book until it is time to leave for school at{8-30.} At school in the morning we write out our spelling, do 'Top Ten Mental' and Maths. We have a break at{10-30}and then do our reading programme until lunch at{12-05.}I have a school dinner and play until the break ends at{1-00. We do not have a set pattern to the afernoon but we usually do English, SRA or something like that until{3-30. When I go home I do my spelling and read or watch TV until teatime. On a Tuesday I set off with my dad in the car to go to my tap and modern dancing class in the village. The class begins at{6-00}and finishes at{7-00.}On my return home I practice my dance steps watch TV or read until bed at{10-00.
